allow: Bash(powershell "Get-NetAdapter | Format-Table Name, InterfaceDescription, Status, MediaType, MacAddress -AutoSize")

Bash(powershell -Command "Get-PnpDevice | Where-Object { $_.FriendlyName -match ''D-Link|WiFi|Wi-Fi|Wireless|802.11|WLAN'' -and $_.Class -eq ''Net'' } | Format-Table Status, FriendlyName, InstanceId -AutoSize")
Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command 'Get-PnpDevice -PresentOnly | Where-Object { $_.InstanceId -like ""USB*"" } | Format-Table Status, Class, FriendlyName -AutoSize')
Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command 'Start-Process netsh -ArgumentList ""interface ip set address `""WiFi 3`"" static 10.5.5.101 255.255.255.0 10.5.5.9"" -Verb RunAs -Wait')
Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command 'Start-Process netsh -ArgumentList ""interface ip set address `""WiFi 4`"" static 10.5.5.100 255.255.255.0 10.5.5.9"" -Verb RunAs -Wait')
Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command 'Start-Process netsh -ArgumentList ""interface ip set address `""WiFi 5`"" static 10.5.5.101 255.255.255.0 10.5.5.9"" -Verb RunAs -Wait')
Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command 'Start-Process cmd -ArgumentList ""/c netsh interface ip set address name=50 static 10.5.5.100 255.255.255.0 10.5.5.9"" -Verb RunAs -Wait')

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command 'Start-Process netsh -ArgumentList ""interface ip set address `""WiFi 5`"" static 10.5.5.100 255.255.255.0 10.5.5.9"" -Verb RunAs -Wait; Start-Process netsh -ArgumentList ""interface ip set address `""WiFi 4`"" static 10.5.5.101 255.255.255.0 10.5.5.9"" -Verb RunAs -Wait')
Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command 'Start-Process netsh -ArgumentList ""interface ip set address `""WiFi 5`"" static 10.5.5.100 255.255.255.0 10.5.5.9"" -Verb RunAs -Wait')
Bash(powershell -Command "Get-PnpDevice -Class Camera -Status OK | Format-Table Name, InstanceId -AutoSize")
